explains: adj. 象征的；可当标志的

sentences.en: The violence is emblematic of what is happening in our inner cities.
sentences.cn: 这种暴力行为正标示了我们市中心贫民区的状况。

sentences.en: The killing in Pensacola is emblematic of a lot of the violence that is happening around the world.
sentences.cn: 发生在彭萨科拉的凶杀案是世界各地发生的大量暴力事件的典型代表。
